verses.name: Numbers 23:24
verses.text: Behold, the people shall rise up as a great lion, and lift up himself as a young lion: he shall not lie down until he eat of the prey, and drink the blood of the slain.

verses.name: Numbers 23:25
verses.text: And Balak said unto Balaam, Neither curse them at all, nor bless them at all.

verses.name: Numbers 23:26
verses.text: But Balaam answered and said unto Balak, Told not I thee, saying, All that the Lord speaketh, that I must do?
